short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boosts audio volume for media on the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A web based volume booster for you to boost your volume past your system's limit so you can really hear those super quiet videos, clips or songs.

I made this extension because too many people were sharing clips/videos that simply were too quiet.

You can set the volume differently for each tab. This extension is tab specific. Hence, one tab can be made louder or quieter than another. If you don't want to boost the volume or return to your default settings, simply slide the slider all the way to the left (the green zone). If the volume is not being boosted, simply refresh the page.

Please be careful when you slide the slider to the red zone. 
I am not liable for any damage caused to your speakers or earphones.

This extension will remain free to use indefinitely.
NO ADVERTS! NO POP-UPS! NO MALWARE!
